title: Halloween: Bruce McCulloch & Amir Baghdadchi
description:
It’s our Halloween Episode! This episode is hosted by Dame Wilburn. To see the extras for this episode, head to our website: themoth.org/extras

Hosted by: Dame Wilburn

Storytellers: Bruce McCulloch & Amir Baghdadchi
itunes:subtitle: Two (not-so-scary) stories that could only have taken place in costume!
itunes:author: The Moth
